name: Gluten-free Focaccia-spiced Biscuits
preparation: In a medium-size bowl, combine gluten-free flour, Rosemary Garlic Seasoning, baking powder, sugar, parmesan cheese, xanthan gum, and salt.
Using your fingers or a pastry blender, cut in butter until mixture is crumbly and blended.
Drizzle in milk, stirring just until a soft sticky dough forms.
Spoon 12 generous tablespoons of dough 1 inch apart on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner. Bake until light-golden, about 12 minutes.
tips: Serve these biscuits with soup, stew, your favourite saucy pasta dish, Red Pepper Jelly, or jam!

products.name: Rosemary Garlic Seasoning
summary: Enjoy hearty, robust flavours on chicken, pork, lamb & grilled or roasted vegetables.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
